channel.title: Need help whit "check if player has item 995/money"

item.title: Need help whit "check if player has item 995/money"
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

It’s correct, but you have closed the if statement because of the semi-colon at the end.

if (Engine.playerItems.hasPlayerItemAmount(p, 995, 10000000))
{
    Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, #####, 1);
    Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 10000000);
    p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "#####");
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help whit "check if player has item 995/money"

Now do it in Java, spoonfeeding is gay.

item.title: Need help whit "check if player has item 995/money"
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

I made set’s in questtab,When i click on command i get they stuff,price is 1m.If i have cash it will remove,but if i dont have cash ill still get the set.Could someone edit my code to work?

if (Engine.playerItems.hasPlayerItemAmount(p, 995, 10000000));
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, #####, 1);
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 10000000);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “#####”);
}

Read full topic
